Description.p: Assigned OID: the OID for the UK subset of SnomedCT, q.v.
Codes taken from the UK subset of SnomedCT representing that a medication being administered to a patient should be discontinued.
A code of TBA indicates that the SnCT code is not yet available.
+ after a code indicates that a descendant of the code shall be used.

concept.displayName: administration of therapeutic substance (procedure) This concept shall be context modified as a procedure by setting the value of the procedure context attribute (408730004) with the value: 385654001 to be stopped (qualifier value)
